title: Implement Responsive Dashboard Grid Layout System
description:
Create a responsive grid-based layout system that supports widget positioning, sizing, and mobile/desktop breakpoints. Build on existing layout computation in dashboard-layout.ts but extend for responsive behavior. The system should handle CSS Grid integration and provide responsive widget sizing.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Extends dashboard-layout.ts with responsive breakpoint support
- Implements CSS Grid framework for widget positioning
- Supports mobile (12 cols) and desktop (24 cols) grid configurations
- Widgets auto-resize based on breakpoint constraints
- Maintains proper spacing and alignment across all screen sizes
- Provides TypeScript interfaces for layout configuration
- Follows functional programming patterns with immutable updates
- Includes comprehensive test coverage for responsive scenarios
